subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Steve Darcis defeated Rafael Nadal in a stunning upset in the first round of Wimbledon last year, but an injury sustained during the match caused him to struggle for the next year.
snippet: Steve Darcis defeated Rafael Nadal in a stunning upset in the first round of Wimbledon last year, but an injury sustained during the match caused him to struggle for the next year.
